title: Rainbow Hair Tutorial - How to Dye your Hair Rainbow | OffbeatLook
description: Check out my Beauty/Fashion Blog: http://OffbeatLook.com This video is in continuation of the last video I posted on how I got the blue out of my hair so it would be ready to dye a new color. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Iq5Wi... I pick up from there and show you the products and techniques I used to dye my hair rainbow. This video was from around April of this year I think, and was a couple hair colors ago but hey I told ya I'd finally get around to editing it! Hope you find this helpful and if you ever decide to dye your hair rainbow or any other color by using one of my tutorials, send me or tag me in a photo on Twitter or Instagram!
